channel.title: github on Dodcott-cum-Wilkesley
channel.description: Recent content in github on Dodcott-cum-Wilkesley

item.title: Moved To Github
item.description: I have moved the web site so that it is now hosted on Github.com. I have also changed the site generator from Pelican to Nikola. I’ll put up another post later to explain why I have made these changes. Meanwhile you may notice a few minor glitches in this site, while I iron out all the little bugs caused by the changes. The new site should well on both mobile devices and computers.
